name: Gauge kpi
body:
### Gauge Indicator (Animated).
This gauge indicator is a web component that you can add to your web pages. It's made in pure HTML-5 and JavaScript, using a canvas object. 
You can visit the page on [GitHub](https://www.github.com/jgirbau/gauge_kpi), for more details.

But you can also check out this live Demo:


### Author: Jorge Girbau
You can find more developments from this author in: [GitHub.com/jgirbau](https://www.github.com/jgirbau).
And check the main page of [Sistemas400.com](http://www.Sistemas400.com).
But if you would like to request for more functionality or any other customization, 
you can directly email to: [jorge.girbau@gmail.com](emailto:jorge.girbau@gmail.com).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Please contact directly to: [Jorge Girbau](http://www.github.com/jgirbau)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
